entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
